title: Hot Sex: Holiday Edition

description:
On today’s show, Emily is joined by producer Jamie and they’re giving you some tips to keep the holidays as sexy as they are jolly!

They discuss ways to keep your sex lives hot during the holidays – literally and figuratively, tell you which pleasure products will make the best gifts – from stocking stuffers to the bigger stuff, and why the holidays are the perfect time of year to ask for what you want in the bedroom.

Thank you for supporting our sponsors who help keep the show FREE: Uberlube, Magic Wand, Good Vibrations, Everlywell & SiriusXM

Follow Emily on all social: @sexwithemily

For even more sex advice, tips & tricks, visit: sexwithemily.com

Check out even more Sex With Emily on SiriusXMStars 109 Mon-Fri 5-7pm PST!


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
